reviewText: This was a great addition to my classroom! Magic School Bus is a great way to show what the kids have been learning in the books! Always a favorite! Fast shipping, great condition, and one happy buyer!

My grandson loves these movies he watching them over and over again. His favorite is the one on the human body. I have never seen these movies but my grandson who is 4 has told me so much about them that I feel that I have watch them. I wish they had a way to buy the set at once so my grandson could have enjoyed them all.
Product is 5 star, but don't buy package deal.  This set currently $26.96 & it's $25.47 if you buy them seperately

I love using the magic school bus videos to teach my 5th grade student science. When I couple these videos with worksheets and hands-on activities, the kids learn so much more and remember what has been taught. Since I teach in Spanish, the spanish language option on the DVD's is wonderful. Thanks!
